system.description:
The Noise Thrasher plays a song and a target within the 40ft radius must guess on what that song is. The skumdog that is the Noise Thrasher uses any means they wish to play the song. If the target is another skumdog they must guess the song, but if the target is a NPC or Enemy they must make a [[/save resolve]] in order to guess.

  • If the target guesses correctly they regain [[/roll 1D6]]+Noise Thrasher Level HP.

  • If they fail to guess the song they take [[/roll 1D6]]+Noise Thrasher Level worth of damage

Picking A Song: If you meta game and pick something simple like Old McDonald’s Farm for another skumdog the Neon Lord has the discretion to punish this tomfoolery. Keep it fun and on brand and who knows, maybe you just might get rewarded for picking a super rad song from the 80’s! FAROUT!
